MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 postcode area of Alloa. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.41pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a faulty underground cable on Arnswell and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:22PM on Sunday 10 January 2021.
